channel.title: Uptime and Online Request Problem?

item.title: Uptime and Online Request Problem?
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

Hi, I would want to know how would have The Uptime of the Server and Players Online being Online show up in my Quest Tab Interface, Can anyone help me?

I have this so far.

public void playersOnline_and_Uptime() { sendQuest((new StringBuilder()).append("@or1@Players online: @gre@").append(PlayerHandler.playerCount).toString()+"", 7332); sendQuest((new StringBuilder()).append("@or1@Uptime: @gre@").append(server.uptime / 2 / 60).append(" @or1@mins").toString(), 663); }

I have that under this.

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Any help would do. Thanks.

Read full topic
